import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const Update = () => { const [user_id, setUser_id] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [city, setCity] = useState(''); const [cpostal, setCpostal] = useState(''); const [address, setAddress] = useState(''); const [siren, setSiren] = useState(''); const [type_studio, setType_studio] = useState(''); const [img_son, setImg_son] = useState(''); const [prix, setPrix] = useState(''); const [nbr_people, setNbr_people] = useState(''); const [tva, setTva] = useState(''); var data = { 'name': name , 'user_id': user_id , 'description':description, 'city' :city, 'cpostal': cpostal, 'address': address, 'siren': siren, 'type_studio': type_studio, 'img_son': img_son, 'prix': prix, 'nbr_people': nbr_people, 'tva':tva, } const validate = (e) => { axios.post('', data, { }).then(function (response) { console.log(response); }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); }; return (
